utACK

On Friday, September 4, 2015, paveljanik notifications@github.com wrote:

> ACK
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6633#issuecomment-137684898.

minping seems to be zero in most cases. Being connected to 3 "incoming peers" on localhost and 8 "outgoing peers" on testnet I get

```
$ getpeerinfo|grep minping
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0.107754,
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0,
    "minping": 0.219713,
    "minping": 9.6e-05,
    "minping": 0,
```\

@MarcoFalke Good catch: nMinPingUsecTime is left uninitialized on CNode creation. And as it is a moving minimum, it should probably default to `std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max()` initially, not zero.\n
